name: player_heatmap
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool sofascores.
Tool description: SofaScores has everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 20+ sports, more than 5000 leagues, tournaments and special events.   We use the best sources for statistics and calculate precise player ratings. Heatmaps visually represent player effort on the field. Find all transfers, player strengths and weaknesses. API description: Fetches the heatmap data for a specific player in a given season and tournament.

player_id.description: The unique identifier for the player.

seasons_id.description: The identifier for the specific season.

unique_tournament_id.description: The identifier for the specific tournament.
